DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to clinically evaluate the spleen during PBPC mobilization by filgrastim in normal donors.
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Trial of Peripheral Blood Progenitor Cell (PBPC) Mobilization by Filgrastim in Normal Donors
DOC.criteria: Eligible to be PBPC donor for allogeneic transplantation as determined by local institution History of splenectomy Previous PBPC mobilization attempts Previous treatment with GCSF or GMCSF
